title: Ticket #1334: cream job lease renewal broken by batched status command
description: The code enhancements to batch cream job status commands (#939) accidentally caused cream job leases to not be renewed in most cases. The individual CreamJob objects need to determine when the job lease will need to be renewed and arrange to be called back then.
remarks:
2010-Apr-06 14:10:20 by jfrey:
Pushed a fix to master for 7.5.3.
